properties.areaDesc: Rappahannock River from Urbanna to Windmill Point; James River from Jamestown to the James River Bridge; York River; James River from James River Bridge to Hampton Roads Bridge-Tunnel
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 10 at 3:17PM EST until January 12 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 knots with gusts to 30 knots. Winds
may occasionally gust to 35 knots, especially at elevated
locations. Waves as high as 2 to 3 feet.

* WHERE...Rappahannock River from Urbanna to Windmill Point,
York River, James River from Jamestown to the James River
Bridge and James River from James River Bridge to Hampton
Roads Bridge- Tunnel.

* WHEN...From 7 PM Saturday to 10 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SATURDAY TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY
